data.name: WorldEnd: What Do You Do at the End of the World? Are You Busy? Will You Save Us?: my happiness
data.short_description: Chtholly helps out around the base as his secretary and gains the adulation of everyone there. Willem, on the other hand, starts having doubts about some unanswered questions after meeting Nopht and Rhantolk.

fullgame.name: WorldEnd: What Do You Do at the End of the World? Are You Busy? Will You Save Us?
